类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E> (implements java.util.Collection<E>)
      • java.util.AbstractList<E> (implements java.util.List<E>)

          • com.zfy.adapter.collections.LightAsyncDiffList<T>
